ygData.subject: spam
ygData.msgSnippet: To minimize spam I am going to configure this list to not let people post until it s approved. This kind of sucks, I like people just being able to join, but
ygData.messageBody:
To minimize spam I am going to configure this list to not let people post
until it's approved.

This kind of sucks, I like people just being able to join, but we have
been getting too much spam lately.

As an asside, while I am happy to continue to maintain this list I must
admit I am feeling like a bit of a slacker these days. If someone feels
like they would like to maintain the list, and perhaps even put some
additional effort into managing it more effectively, email me off the list
and let me know =) Otherwise I will continue to moderate it in my
slacker-type fashion.

Christina
